text: There Was an Old Couple () is a 1965 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Chukhrai.Лучшая бабушка советского кино. Как Вера Кузнецова покорила КанныЖили-были старик со старухой It stars Ivan Marin, Vera Kuznetsova, and Lyudmila Maksakova. ==Actors== * Ivan Marin as The Old Man, Gusakov * Vera Kuznetsova as The Old Woman, Gusakova * Lyudmila Maksakova as Nina * Georgy Martyniuk as Valentin * Galina Polskikh as Galya * Anatoli Yabbarov as Sectarian == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1965 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Chukhrai
title: There Was an Old Couple
